name: DBDataSource
summary: DBDataSource is an easy to use datasource conforming to both UITableView and UICollectionView.
description: DBDataSource is an easy to use datasource conforming to both UITableView and UICollectionView that can be dropped in to a project to allow quick population of tableviews and collectionviews. Use the CellConfigureBlock to populate the contents of your cell and initialise the datasource with an array.
